name: Sandygast
description: Born from a sand mound playfully built by a child, this Pokémon embodies the grudges of the departed.

abilities.name: Water Compaction
abilities.effect: Raises this Pokémon's Defense by two stages when it's hit by a Water move.
abilities.description: Boosts the Pokémon’s Defense stat sharply when hit by a Water-type move.

abilities.name: Sand Veil
abilities.effect: During a sandstorm, this Pokémon has 1.25× its evasion, and it does not take sandstorm damage regardless of type.  The evasion bonus does not count as a stat modifier.  Overworld: If the lead Pokémon has this ability, the wild encounter rate is halved in a sandstorm.
